name: Perdition Demo Ver. 1.0
description:
!WELCOME TO PERDITION!

There will be two main routes available in the full version of the game. In this demo version, only the beginning of Orpheus' route is available.

ORPHEUS ROUTE

Day and night, searching in the dark streets of Perdition, Orpheus is searching for Euridice, a dear friend of his. Waking up from a daze, an eccentric detective that calls themself Charon greets him, and states that their services as a Private Investigator have been called upon to aid in Orpheus' search.
